name: JP Latest Posts Shortcode
author: Skjoy

sections.description:
This is a simple plugin for listing latest posts from your blog.Use shortcode [latest-posts] to post or page.Then see,a list of latest posts will appear to your desired post or page.This plugin also contains a widget for showing latest post in widget/sidebar area.Enjoy…

For live demo visit http://skjoybd.com
sections.installation:
• From your WordPress Dashboard Go for a “Add New” inside “Plugins” menu.
  • Search for “JP Latest Posts Shortcode” and install the plugin.
  • Activate the plugin

You: have finished your installation.

Now go to admin panel from Dashboard > Settings > Latest Posts for Necessary settings.

  • Now go to a post or page whatever you like.
  • Paste this shortcode into the page or post and save it: 
    [latest-posts]
  • Goto page or post preview,then see the result.
  • If you want to display Latest Posts to your sidebar go to Dashboard > Appearance > Widgets and drag JP Latest Posts Widget to your sidebar.Then see the result.
